title: Ava Duvernay Interview and More
itunes:title: Ava Duvernay Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had Ava Duvernay stop by, where she spoke about her new Netflix series "When they See Us" a central park five based series, Criminal Injustice and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to NBA player Josh Jackson for trying to hard to get into the VIP section during Rolling Loud. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners were offended by the recent trailer "Loqueesha" , a movie about a white man posing as a black woman on the radio.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had Ava Duvernay stop by, where she spoke about her new Netflix series "When they See Us" a central park five based series, Criminal Injustice and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to NBA player Josh Jackson for trying to hard to get into the VIP section during Rolling Loud. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners were offended by the recent trailer "Loqueesha" , a movie about a white man posing as a black woman on the radio.
